pageContent: Aims and objectives: To evaluate the symptoms and self-assessment of quality of life in men with localised prostate cancer after having had a radical prostatectomy or brachytherapy treatment.

metaData.source:
Regional, provider, and economic factors associated with the choice of active surveillance in the treatment of men with localized prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23271776/
